name: verne-lang
description: A minimalistic type-checked lisp-like language for the web.

scripts.bundle: pulp build --force --modules Language.Verne.Parser,Data.Either,Language.Verne.TypeChecker,Language.Verne.Namespace,Language.Verne.Runner,Language.Verne.Types,Language.Verne --to index.js && echo 'module.exports = PS;' >> index.js
